p.s: Description of Chlorobaculum tepidum comb. nov.
Basonym: Chlorobium tepidum Wahlund et al. 1991.
The species description is basically that given by Wahlund et al. (1991) and Pfennig & Overmann (2001a) for Chlorobium tepidum.
It is a moderately thermophilic freshwater species without a salt requirement and with a DNA G+C content of 56·5 mol%.
The GenBank/EMBL accession number for the 16S rDNA sequence of the type strain is M58468.
The type strain of Chlorobium tepidum, ATCC 49652T, is phylogenetically distant from all other strains that belong to this group.
It is proposed as the type strain of Chlorobaculum tepidum sp. nov.
